            <div id="dnn_ContentPane"><a name="5572"></a>

<link href="/Portals/0/Containers/UTIcon/container.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
<div id="dnn_ctr5572_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_5572 --><div id="dnn_ctr5572_ModuleContent" class="UTI_ContentManagerContent">
	<div id="dnn_ctr5572_Viewer_UP">
		<span id="dnn_ctr5572_Viewer_lblContent"><h1>Automotive/Diesel &amp; Industrial Technology Core Training Program</h1>
<p>This program combines all the courses from UTI’s Automotive Technology plus our Diesel and Industrial Technology program to train you for a career as a professional technician in each of these industries. It’s the best of both worlds, offering you the enhanced flexibility to pursue any number of career options in both the automotive and diesel industries.</p>
<p><img align="right" style="margin-left: 10px;" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UserContent/images/UTIWebsitePics/Diesel/UTI_Dallas-Hydraulics.jpg" alt="" /></p>
<p>In the Automotive/Diesel and Industrial technology program, we’ll train you to keep today’s cars, medium/heavy duty trucks and industrial equipment running strong. You’ll learn preventative maintenance, diagnostics and repairs before advancing into specialty training on electrical, hydraulics and transport refrigeration.</p>
<h2>Available at These Campuses:</h2>
<ul class="bulletList">
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/uti-Phoenix">UTI Phoenix</a> (Avondale, AZ)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Chicago">UTI Chicago</a> (Glendale Heights, IL)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Houston">UTI Houston</a> (Houston, TX)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Sacramento">UTI Sacramento</a> (Sacramento, CA)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Los-Angeles">UTI Los Angeles</a> (Rancho Cucamonga, CA)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Dallas" title="UTI Dallas">UTI Dallas/Fort Worth</a> (Irving, TX)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Philadelphia" title="UTI Philadelphia">UTI Philadelphia</a> (Exton, PA)</li>
    <li><a href="/Campus-Locations/Boston" title="UTI Boston">UTI Boston</a> (Norwood, MA)</li>
</ul>
<h2>Core Program Length</h2>
<p>The Automotive/Diesel and Industrial Technology program is 75-weeks long. Classes start every few weeks. Contact your preferred campus for the next available session.</p>
<p><a target="_blank" href="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/PDF/ADI_FACTSHEET_June2011-FINAL.pdf">Click here to view the Auto/Diesel and Industrial program fact sheet.</a></p>
<h2>Electives</h2>
<p><img align="right" style="margin-left: 10px;" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UserContent/images/UTIWebsitePics/Diesel/Refreg.jpg" alt="" /></p>
<p>As an Automotive/Diesel and Industrial student, you’ll qualify for every elective* within those disciplines, including:</p>
<ul class="bulletList">
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/BMW">BMW FastTrack</a> (additional 12 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Ford">Ford Accelerated Credential Training (FACT)</a> (additional 15 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Mercedes-Benz">Mercedes-Benz STARt</a> (additional 12 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Nissan">Nissan Advanced Technology Training (NATT)</a> (additional 9 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Toyota">Toyota Professional Automotive Training (TPAT)</a> (additional 9 weeks)</li>
    <li>Smog Elective (California only) (additional 9 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Cummins">Cummins Engine Program (CEP)</a> (additional 12 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Cummins">Cummins Power Generation Elective</a> (additional 12 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Daimler">Daimler Trucks Technician Elective (DTNA)</a> (additional 12 weeks)</li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/International">International Technician Education Progam</a> (additional 6 weeks)</li>
    <li><a title="NASCAR Technology Elective" href="/Programs/NASCAR">NASCAR Technology Elective</a> (18 weeks)</li>
</ul>
<p><i>*All electives not available at every campus location. See your UTI Course Catalog for details.</i></p>
<h2>MSAT Post-Graduate Programs</h2>
<p>Exceptional students may qualify for invitations to <a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs">Manufacturer Specific Advanced Training</a> (MSAT) programs. These manufacturer sponsored training programs offer students advanced training opportunities in return for conditional employment upon graduation. Current MSAT offerings include:</p>
<ul class="bulletList">
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/BMW">BMW Service Technician Education Program (STEP)</a></li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/MINI">MINI Service Technician Education Program (STEP)</a></li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Porsche">Porsche Technician Apprenticeship Program (PTAP)</a></li>
    <li><a href="/Programs/Automotive-Diesel-Collision-Repair/Manufacturer-Programs/Volvo">Volvo Service Automotive Factory Education (SAFE)</a></li>
